index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Pike Place Urban Renewal Project; authorizing application for and execution of an agreement with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) for financial assistance in connection with the completion of project activities; authorizing implementation of said project by the Department of Community Development; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
